subject: Singleton
msgSnippet: ... Jesus H Christ. I had that experience. That s why I wrote Use your singletons wisely . (Google it, if you haven t read it and want to.) I can still
messageBody:
>So said David Boyer on 2003-08-01 --------------------
>My biggest pet peeve in my current job, is a Monster Singleton that's
>referred to by static reference EVERYWHERE IN OUR GUI!!!!

Jesus H Christ. I had that experience. That's why I wrote "Use your singletons wisely". (Google it, if you haven't read it and want to.) I can still remember the feeling of pain that prompted me to write it.

Take care.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
